data.eml:eml: Dwarfs under dinosaur legs: a new millipede of the order Callipodida (Diplopoda) from Cretaceous amber of Burma

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stoev, Pavel, Moritz, Leif, Wesener, Thomas (2019): Dwarfs under dinosaur legs: a new millipede of the order Callipodida (Diplopoda) from Cretaceous amber of Burma. ZooKeys 841: 79-96, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.841.34991, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.841.34991
